pageProps.data:
## MeanStd

###### Description

Extract mean and std of pixel values of the image
 Returns 2 pixels in a column, in which the top is the mean, and the bottom is the std values.

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Inptut image|
|**layers**|<var>number</var>|Number of layers for a parallel reduction|
|**ignoreStd?**|<var>boolean</var>|if true, operatino will return only one pixel with mean values|
